org.openscience.cdk.renderer
Class Java2DRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.renderer.Java2DRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IJava2DRenderer, ISimpleRenderer2D
public class Java2DRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IJava2DRenderer

A Java2D based 2D renderer for IChemObjects.

Author:
nielsout
Belongs to CDK module:
render

revision 9162

                         java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
